Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
10.10.2014 SH SCR19220 OMQ316B Replaced calls of GB433 by DSQL calculations for V.INVESTMENTCMONH and
-- Used to lock MQ and CLNA, see R.S.
-- Shortcut labels
-- OMQ316 is called for MQ = 316 and 317
-- Shortcut handling
... lock advance/message (active user)
-- Send email to the first and second approver that the advance is deleted
... fetch email address of client manager
... fetch email address of department manager
... no need to unlock advance/message, already deleted
... lock advance/message (active user)
... unlock advance/message (active user)
... in case of second/third approval the MQDT rows is already deleted
-- Fetch tasktitle according to PI.MQDT_ID
... set/reset
... lock not possible because CLNA row is locked by an other user
... lock
... unlock
... lock not possible because locked by another user
... set cursor always on first parkable field on screen, speeds up scrolling if e.g. a button was pressed
-- Additional checks if MQ's for the curent advance can be deleted
-- Deletion is allowed continue within separate task (transaction lvel)
-- Approval is allowed continue within separate task (transaction lvel)
-- Obtain CLNA again, to avoid that CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED is changed in the meanwhile
-- Error: "Advance is already charged to client, deletion is not allowed"
-- Error: "MQ xxx is locked by user xxx"
-- Obtain CLNA again, to avoid that CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED is changed in the meanwhile
-- Error: "Advance is already charged to client"
-- Check if securities have been released by the security department
... error: "Securities have not yet been released by the security department"
-- Check if advance exceeds maximal investment
... error: "Advance exceeds maximal investment"
-- Check user permission for this client approval (client data access)
... error: "No modify permission for this program or client"
-- Error: "MQ xxx is locked by user xxx"
... error: "Insufficient permission for approval"
... error: "'You are not authorized to perform the second approval"
... no further tests for third approval
... info: "Advance exceeds deposited amount"
... info (incl. confirmation): "Advance exceeds guest account + deposited amount"
-- Test A – Check deposit balance
-- Test B – Check legal balance

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CMON join :1/CLNT on :2 where CMON_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CMON_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CMON_YEAR = :3 and CMON_MONTH = :4 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':5' for fetch only
select cast(sum(CLNA_AADVANCEH) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CLNA join :1/CLNT on :2 where CLNA_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CLNA_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNA_CLIENTCHARGED ='N' for fetch only

Text.val: -- Further updates for second approval
... book advance (advance does not exceed deposited amount)
... advance cannot be booked, SCF control must be informed (third approval)
-- Further updates for third approval
... book advance
-- First approval
... set CLNA_RUNNUMBER
-- Second approval
... set variables, used to call BCM001 in parent task
-- Third approval
... set variables, used to call BCM001 in parent task
